com.qoppa.pdf.annotations

Interface Line

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Annotation, ShapeAnnotation

    public interface Line
extends ShapeAnnotation
    Interface representing a Line annotation in a PDF document. Line annotations are displayed as a line and can be double-clicked to display its content.
    Author:
    Qoppa Software

      • getCreationDate

        java.util.Date getCreationDate()
        Returns the date and time when the annotation was created. Milliseconds are always zero since the PDF date format doesn't support milliseconds.
        Returns:
        The date and time when the annotation was created.
